name: The 2024 International Conference on Big Data Analysis and Application
content: The 2024 International Conference on Big Data Analysis and Application (ICBDAA 2024) will take place in Singapore during Dec. 6-8, 2024, which is in conjunction with CDICS 2024(www.cdics.org).ICBDAA 2024 is the main annual big data conference aimed at presenting current research being carried out. We cordially invite you to submit your recent research work to ICBDAA 2024 and attend the conference to share your latest research results and valuable experiences with other scientists, engineers, and scholars. Papers will be selected through a review process. After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to Engineering Village, Scopus and other databases for review and indexing.
